summary: Two blind masseurs travel to a mountain retreat. One of them falls for a visiting lady from Tokyo and investigates a series of thefts.
cast: Shotaro Akagi|Shin'ichi Himori|Ayuko Hirano|Toru Hirose|Zentaro Iijima|Akio Isono|Hideko Kasuga|Toshiaki Konoe|Chieko Kyotani|Fusako Maki|Mitsuko Miura|Hiroshi Mizuhara|Masako Nakaido|Ren Niki|Tsuneo Ohsugi|Shin Saburi|Takeshi Sakamoto|Kaoru Seki|Mieko Takamine|Shin Tokudaiji|Jun Yokoyama|Munenobu Yui
title: Anma to onna
